Kena! Tim Penikam Tangkap Remaja yang Nge-prank Jadi Pocong
03 Nov 2019, 10:03 by Reinhard Soplantila
Makassar - Polisi menangkap dua orang remaja yang membuat prank hantu pocong di Kota Makassar, Sulawesi Selatan (Sulsel). Mereka sengaja menakuti para pengendara yang melintas di malam hari.
"Kami dari tim Penikam (Penindakan Gangguan Kamtibmas) Polrestabes Makassar berdasarkan informasi yang kami terima di satu daerah di Jalan Banta Bantaeng ada dua remaja yang menakuti-nakuti warga yang lewat di situ. Mereka menggunakan kain putih menyerupai pocong. Pada saat kami di TKP, kami temukan dua remaja itu," ujar Katim Penikam Polrestabes Makassar, Ipda Arif Muda, pada Minggu (3/11/2019).
Kedua remaja itu diciduk oleh tim Penikam Polrestabes Makassar di Jalan Banta Bantaeng sesaat setelah melakukan aksi video prank-nya.
Selain menangkap kedua remaja tersebut bersamaan dengan kain putih untuk menjadi pocong, polisi menyita senjata tajam jenis anak panah dari salah satu pelaku.
"Saat diperiksa satu remaja membawa busur dan pelontar, satu lagi ditemukan pakaian putih yang digunakan sebagai pocong," ungkap Arif.
Dari hasil interogasi yang dilakukan polisi, motif kedua remaja ini hanya untuk menakuti pengendara dan video prank-nya ini hanya untuk dokumentasi pribadi.
"Motifnya adalah dia cuma menakuti orang yang lewat. Adapun yang ditemukan dari HP anak itu belum sempat di-upload di media sosial, jadi video itu untuk dokumentasi mereka," kata Arif.

Got hit! The Teenager-Stabbing Team who pranked to be Pocong
03 Nov 2019, 10:03 by Reinhard Soplantila
Makassar - Police arrested two teenagers who made Pocong ghost prank in Makassar City, South Sulawesi (South Sulawesi). They deliberately frighten motorists who pass by at night.
"We are from the Makassar Police Polrestabes Penikam (Acting Disruption Actions) team based on information we received in one area on Bantaeng Street, there were two teenagers who frightened residents who passed by. They used white cloths like pocong. When we were at the TKP, we found the two teenagers, "said Katim Penikam Makassar Polrestabes, Ipda Arif Muda, on Sunday (3/11/2019).
The two teenagers were arrested by the Makassar Police Penikam Team on Jalan Banta Bantaeng shortly after taking a video prank action.
In addition to arresting the two teenagers together with a white cloth to become pocong, the police confiscated an arrow type sharp weapon from one of the perpetrators.
"When examined one teenager carrying a bow and thrower, another was found white clothing that was used as a pocong," said Arif.
From the results of the police interrogation, the motives of the two teenagers were only to frighten motorists and the prank video was only for personal documentation.
"The motive is that he only scares passers-by. As for what he found on the child's cell phone, he hasn't uploaded it on social media, so the video is for their documentation," Arif said.
